name: SMART速 Health Card Reference Designs
description:
This work provides SMART速 Health Cards (https://smarthealth.cards/) and the implementers with (1) guidance on appropriate display and use of SMART速 Health Cards and (2) reference designs.


The overall objective is to encourage consistent visual representations of SMART Health Cards to increase recognition among users and verifiers.


Note that these reference designs refer to the VCI SMART速 Health Cards: Vaccination & Testing Implementation Guide (https://vci.org/ig/vaccination-and-testing/)


Open source at: https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/health-cards-designs
